item.title: Silent Hill 2: Starting Your Adventure (Gameplay, Cutscenes, Tips, & More!)
item.description: Start Your Adventure into Bloober Team's remake of the Konami hit classic with these general tips for Silent Hill 2.

item.title: Pokemon GO: Best Moveset For Zamazenta
item.description:
As many other live-service titles operate with constant events and opportunities to keep players coming back for more, Pokemon GO is no different in this format. Every season of the game, Trainers have a series of recurring and one-off events that offer new Research opportunities, Collection Challenges, shiny hunting chances, Raid Battles, Max Battles, and more.

Through Pokemon GO's Max Out Season and the events taking place in this timeframe, Zamazenta made a return as a Raid Boss for players to go up against in battle, and even obtain for their collection. Following this, plenty of players will be planning to utilize Zamazenta in battle, due to it being a Legendary monster with some solid stats. However, to gain the most benefit from including this Pokemon in their team rotation, Trainers should know the best movesets for Zamazenta. Players can find all relevant information regarding suitable moveset combinations and potential damage output for this Pokemon in the guide below.

Best Moveset For "Hero of Many Battles" Zamazenta

In Pokemon GO , Zamazenta is a pure Fighting Type Pokemon , meaning its weaknesses and resistance are fairly even and easy to keep in mind, in comparison to dual-Types. Zamazenta is powerful in battle matchups against Rock, Bug, and Dark Type enemies, so players should look to best utilize it in scenarios against these Pokemon.

To further boost Hero of Many Battles Zamazenta's power during combat, players should keep an eye out for any opportunities to fight under Cloudy weather conditions, as this legendary monster will receive an increase in power through the Weather Boost mechanic .

While Zamazenta's Hero of Many battles form is effective against some foes, it is also weak to Pokemon or powerful moves of the Psychic, Fairy, and Flying Types . Due to this, Trainers should aim to avoid such matchups when including Zamazenta on their team rotation and plan the other members of their team to effectively fill these gaps and overcome this Type advantage.

When paired with the best Fast Move and Charged Move combination, which has been outlined below, players can expect Zamazenta's Hero of Many Battles form to deal approximately 14.73 damage per second, and a total damage output of around 531.1 before fainting to opponents in battle.

Best Hero of Many Battles Zamazenta Moveset

  • Fast Move : Metal Claw
  • Charged Move : Close Combat

In the case that you may need to slightly alter your Hero of Many Battles Zamazenta moveset for reasons such as better general Type coverage, or in anticipation of enemies you expect to face, a list of additional moveset combinations and their expected damage potential have been included below.

Best Moveset For "Crowned Shield" Zamazenta

As Zamazenta's Crowned Shield form remains a pure Fighting Type Pokemon, the best moveset of Metal Claw and Close Combat remains the same for this variant of the monster.

Best Hero of Many Battles Zamazenta Moveset

  • Fast Move : Metal Claw
  • Charged Move : Close Combat

However, in comparison to Hero of Many Battles Zamazenta, Crowned Shield Zamazenta receives an improvement to its maximum CP range and stats, as illustrated below:

item.title: Infinite Craft: 10 Best Things To Make First
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Craft essential elements like Plant and Human first in Infinite Craft to unlock endless combinations and intricate items.
  • Time is crucial for crafting time-related elements like Clock and Sun, using Sand and Hourglass for endless possibilities.
  • Make Adam and Eve early in Infinite Craft to access unique combinations, such as Man, Woman, and Original Sin.

Infinite Craft allows players to make almost anything in no sequential order to unlock infinite recipes and elements. While there’s nothing wrong with diving into the game in a nonconsecutive manner, players may have a hard time unlocking specific recipes. There are certain essential elements players should consider making first to save time and make the entire crafting process easier.

These essential elements are key ingredients in endless combinations. When a player crafts these items first, they can quickly discover complex and intricate elements as they further progress into their crafting quest. Players can access these essential elements in their inventory anytime to craft endless items and make First Discoveries. Instead of making elements that can only be used in a few recipes, consider making these items when getting started with Infinite Craft to make countless elements available.

Updated by Usama Ali on Oct 14, 2024: Infinite Craft is a unique sandbox-style game where players can create a wide variety of things by combining different elements. All players begin with the four basic elements: Fire, Water, Earth, and Wind, which they can combine to create new items. While players can create anything they can think of, it’s a good idea to craft some essential items early on to lay a solid foundation. This list has now been updated with a few more items that players should craft first to explore the full potential of Infinite Craft.

Infinite Craft has endless combinations and possibilities, with some elements having multiple recipes. As a result, this article will not cover all the methods involved in creating an element, only the fastest and easiest recipes.

10 Life

Used To Craft New Creatures, Plants, And Concepts

Life is one of the first things players should craft in Infinite Craft , as it opens up the door to new and exciting possibilities. Once they have Life, players can start crafting other living creatures, like Fish, concepts like Death, Reincarnation, Immortality, and Progress, and even fictional characters like Ghosts and Zombies.

Crafting Life is relatively easy in Infinite Craft , involving a combination of the basic elements you start with. To make Life, players can either combine Steam and Venus, or Earth and Mars. Both of these combinations yield Life, which is a fundamental building block in the game.

9 Plant

Used To Craft Living Organisms

Crafting a Plant in Infinite Craft ensures players can unlock living organisms like Tree, Flower, and Rose. These can further be used to create more elements, such as Forest. To make Plant in Infinite Craft, players should combine Water and Earth. This is the shortest method to creating Plant, since Water and Earth are base elements.

Other recipes that can craft Plant are Fire and Smoke, Earth and Tree, and Water and Swamp. After creating Plant, combine it with Planet to make Earth and Tobacco to make Cigarette. There are endless combinations players can discover with Plant, so crafting it first is a great idea.

8 Metal

Used To Create Tin, Swords, And Much, Much More

Another crucial item players should craft early on Infinite Craft is Metal. Even though it sounds pretty simple, Metal isn’t that easy to discover. Without the right recipe, crafting Metal can be a challenge. Once unlocked, though, it allows players to create new items like Ships, weapons, such as Swords and Guns, and even Black Holes.

There are a few different ways to make Metal in Infinite Craft , but the easiest way is to combine Fire and Furnace. It’s a six-step process that only requires the four basic elements. Alternatively, players can take the long route and combine two Steel blocks to make Metal.

7 Human

Used To Craft Items Related To People

Making Human is essential in a player’s Infinite Crafting quest, as it’s a key ingredient to crafting various items related to people. This includes Author, Samurai, Judge, Fisherman, Chinese, Writer, and Warrior. To make a Human in Infinite Craft , players should combine Dust and Life. While numerous combinations exist to create Human in Infinite Craft , Life + Dust is the fastest method.

By making Human first in Infinite Craft , players can make famous people, different professions, and various entities. For example, mixing Human and Planet creates Alien, while combining Human with the US President forms Barack Obama. There are so many items players can combine with the Human block, increasing the need to make it first.

6 Time

Used To Craft Time-Related Elements

Time is another essential element players should make first when diving into Infinite Craft . It can be used to make numerous time-related objects, such as Clock, Dinosaur, Sun, and Fossils. The easiest way to make Time in Infinite Craft is to mix Sand and Hourglass. This simple 5-step process utilizes the four base elements - Fire, Water, Earth, and Wind.

After creating Time, use it to craft more in-depth and complex elements, like T-Rex, Rock, and Rainbow. Since Infinite Craft is AI-generated, players have the freedom to mix and match Time with any element in their inventory to see what interesting and unique items they come up with.

5 Sun

The Original Life Force

The Sun is as important in Infinite Craft as it is in the real world. With the help of it, players can craft all sorts of fun elements, from everyday items like the Calendar to constructing massive structures like the Solar System and Moon. Players can try out unique combinations with the Sun, which is why it is one of the first things they should craft.

To craft the Sun, players simply need to combine Planet with Dandelion. Making a Dandelion is as easy as merging Plant and Wind, which are both available early on. Once they have the Sun, players can combine it with Water to create the Rainbow, or Wind to craft the Sunflower.

4 Adam And Eve

The Beginning Of Humanity

Adam and Eve are essential elements in Infinite Craft for unlocking hundreds of combinations, including Sin. Players who first craft Adam and Eve will have an easier time unlocking unique items like Man and Woman, which are key ingredients in other combinations. To make Adam and Eve in Infinite Craft , players must make them separately in a simple 9-step process.

Players should mix Mud and Venus to make Adam and combine Adam and Venus to make Eve. Players who want to get Adam and Eve as one element must fuse Adam with America to get Adam Sandler, before combining it with Eve to make “Adam and Eve.” Players can use Adam and Eve in countless recipes to make Human, Apple, Original Sin, and Geisha.

3 Continent

Used To Craft Places And Regions Around The Globe

Crafting the Continent in Infinite Craft early on is the key to setting some roots down. With the Continent block, players can travel worldwide and discover places like America, Japan, Asia, and Hawaii. Players can also use Continent to make elements like Sand, Desert, and Land. The shortest method for crafting Continent in Infinite Craft is to combine Island and Earth.

After making Continent, combine it with any element on the dashboard to discover interesting items like Pangaea. Continent is a crucial item used in complex recipes like Anime. To create Anime, players must first create Asia by mixing Continent and Mountain. As a result, making Continent can help players quickly discover unconventional elements.

2 Energy

Used To Create An Infinite Number Of Other Elements

Making Energy when first getting started with Infinite Craft will save players a lot of time unlocking other recipes. Energy is a key ingredient in infinite combinations, from Storm and Tornado to Laser and Chemistry. The easiest way to make Energy in Infinite Craft is to fuse Fire and Windmill in an intricate 15-step process. Although the method is somewhat lengthy, it’s worthwhile, as players can use Energy to discover the game's most complex items, like Billionaire.

After crafting Energy, combine it with Lightning to make a Laser, or God to make the Universe. Players can also mix Energy with Moon to create Lunar and with Book to craft Knowledge.

1 Love

The Universal Language Understood By All

There are so many items players can combine with the Love block, making it a must-have for any Infinite Craft player. Love is a concept that can be explored and experienced in countless ways, and it’s up to the player to decide what they want to create with this powerful element.

Interestingly, there are multiple recipes for Love. Combining two Kiss blocks, or a Heart and a Queen, are just a few examples. The simplest way to craft Love is to merge Human and Cupid. The Cupid block can be obtained by combining Human and Angel, so Love is surprisingly easy to craft in the early game.

item.title: New York Times Strands Hints and Answers for October 14, 2024
item.description:
Strands has yet another grid of seemingly-random letters to sort through, looking for some words that fit today's theme. But first you need to figure that theme out, and you only have one, single clue to do it with. That makes this one of most difficult word-searches ever made.

While the rules of Strands allows for an in-game hint system, there are loads of reasons not to use it. If you want help but don't want to use those hints, you can find all sorts of help below. From spoilers to general clues, you can find everything you need to solve this one in the article below.

The NYT Games Strands Puzzle #225 October 14, 2024

The Strands puzzle for today is Get Out of Here! There are nine words to find in it: one Spangram and eight themed words.

New York Times Games Strands Clues

If a hint or two about the theme would be helpful, you should check out the three sections below. Each one has a spoiler-free clue that will lead you a little closer to the overall theme in this mobile puzzle game.

General Hint 1

General Hint 2

General Hint 3

Spoilers for Two of the Words in Today's Strands

If you want to see one of two of the answers to this one, look inside the two sections below. Each one contains just one spoiled theme word (not the Spangram), and a screenshot of where it goes in the letter grid.

Spoiler 1

Spoiler 2

The Answer to Today's New York Times Games Strands

The answer to today's New York Times Games Strands is in the expandable section below. If you peek inside, you will see all of the themed words and where each of them go inside the puzzle's letter grid.

Today's Strands Explained

If an explanation would help you, you can find one below. Check out the expandable section for a breakdown of how the clue and the theme are a perfect pair in this puzzle game.

Want to play? Check out the New York Times Games Strands website available on almost any device with a browser.

item.title: New York Times Connections Hints and Answers for #491 October 14, 2024
item.description:
Connections is back with yet another difficult puzzle. It can be pretty easy to get stuck on this one, since both the words and the categories can be pretty challenging. And you only get four mistakes, too.

If you are stuck on today's puzzle and already know how to play Connections , this article will have everything you need to complete it. Inside you'll find everything from general clues, category help, spoilers, and even the full answer to the puzzle.

Words in the NYT Connections Puzzle #491 for October 14, 2024

The Connections puzzle for today contains the words: Pony, Roll, Comb, Book, Root, Tree, Clap, Table, Bun, Salad, Dig, Rumble, Sift, Twist, Peal, and Brand.

Hints for the NYT Connections Puzzle

In today's Connections puzzle game, you will be presented with some challenging words. Here are some hints to help you put them in all the right places.

Answers for Today's NYT Connections #491 for October 14, 2024
